mapper.select: SELECT brd.o_date, brd.o_number, brd.b_num, brd.b_id, brd.b_name, brd.o_price, brd.o_state FROM ( SELECT o.o_date, o.o_number, b.b_num, b.b_id, b.b_name, o.o_price, o.o_state, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY o.o_date DESC) AS rNum FROM ProductOrder o JOIN Buyer b ON o.order_b_id = b.b_id ) brd WHERE rNum BETWEEN (${pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND ${pageNum}*10 ORDER BY brd.o_date DESC

SELECT brd.o_date, brd.o_number, brd.b_num, brd.b_id, brd.b_name, brd.o_price, brd.o_state FROM ( SELECT o.o_date, o.o_number, b.b_num, b.b_id, b.b_name, o.o_price, o.o_state, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY o.o_date DESC) AS rNum FROM ProductOrder o JOIN Buyer b ON o.order_b_id = b.b_id JOIN Product p ON o.order_p_number = p.p_number WHERE o.o_number = #{orderNum} OR b.b_name = #{buyerName} OR p.p_number = #{productNum} ORDER BY o.o_date DESC ) brd WHERE rNum BETWEEN (${pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND ${pageNum}*10 ORDER BY brd.o_date DESC

SELECT brd.o_date, brd.o_number, brd.b_num, brd.b_id, brd.b_name, brd.o_price, brd.o_state FROM ( SELECT o.o_date, o.o_number, b.b_num, b.b_id, b.b_name, o.o_price, o.o_state, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY o.o_date DESC) AS rNum FROM ProductOrder o JOIN Buyer b ON o.order_b_id = b.b_id JOIN Product p ON o.order_p_number = p.p_number WHERE o.o_date > curdate() ORDER BY o.o_date DESC ) brd WHERE rNum BETWEEN (${pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND ${pageNum}*10 ORDER BY brd.o_date DESC

SELECT brd.o_date, brd.o_number, brd.b_num, brd.b_id, brd.b_name, brd.o_price, brd.o_state FROM ( SELECT o.o_date, o.o_number, b.b_num, b.b_id, b.b_name, o.o_price, o.o_state, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY o.o_date DESC) AS rNum FROM ProductOrder o JOIN Buyer b ON o.order_b_id = b.b_id JOIN Product p ON o.order_p_number = p.p_number WHERE o.o_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK ) AND NOW() ORDER BY o.o_date DESC ) brd WHERE rNum BETWEEN (${pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND ${pageNum}*10 ORDER BY brd.o_date DESC

SELECT brd.o_date, brd.o_number, brd.b_num, brd.b_id, brd.b_name, brd.o_price, brd.o_state FROM ( SELECT o.o_date, o.o_number, b.b_num, b.b_id, b.b_name, o.o_price, o.o_state, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY o.o_date DESC) AS rNum FROM ProductOrder o JOIN Buyer b ON o.order_b_id = b.b_id JOIN Product p ON o.order_p_number = p.p_number WHERE o.o_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH ) AND NOW() ORDER BY o.o_date DESC ) brd WHERE rNum BETWEEN (${pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND ${pageNum}*10 ORDER BY brd.o_date DESC

SELECT o.o_number, b.b_id, o.o_price, o.o_date, o.o_receiver_phone, o.o_receiver_name, b.b_email ,o.o_address1, o.o_address2, o.o_address3, b.b_name, b.b_grade, p.p_name, o.o_count, b.b_grade FROM ProductOrder o JOIN Buyer b ON o.order_b_id = b.b_id JOIN Product p ON o.order_p_number = p.p_number WHERE o.o_number = #{orderNum}
